Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for the help builder.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void CustomizeSymbol (this System.CommandLine.Help.HelpBuilder builder, System.CommandLine.Symbol symbol, string? firstColumnText = default, string? secondColumnText = default, string? defaultValue = default);

Docs.param: The help builder to write with.
The symbol to customize the help details for.
A delegate to display the first help column (typically name and usage information).
A delegate to display second help column (typically the description).
The displayed default value for the symbol.
Docs.summary: Specifies custom help details for a specific symbol.
